metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13011 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Several protocol parsers in tcpdump before 4.9.2 could cause a buffer overflow in util-print.c:bittok2str_internal().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
